instructions: Download and install the Cortana app from the Google Play Store . Launch the Cortana app and tap Allow to grant Cortana access to your location, which is used to bring you weather forecasts, restaurant recommendations, and more. Tap Sign In or Create Account to log in with your Microsoft account . Tap Agree to accept the terms and privacy agreement. Tap Turn On to add Cortana to your home menu, or tap Skip . Tap Allow to grant Cortana access to your microphone so that you can give voice commands.

Open the Cortana app and tap the menu icon in the upper-right corner. Tap Settings . Tap Phone settings . Tap Set Cortana as default assistant . Tap Cortana . Tap Agree . Long-press the home shortcut on your phone at any time to talk to Cortana.

Open the Cortana app and tap the microphone icon. Give a voice command. For example, say one of the following: Open Facebook . Show me the top news headlines. What s 15 times 34? Turn on Bluetooth . Add a dentist appointment to my calendar for tomorrow at 2 p.m. Set an alarm for an hour from now. Alternatively, tap the rows of dots beside the microphone to type your command.
